title: 2.0.- Smart VOC
description: In this section you can go deeper in the understanding of the participants by using declarative questions oriented to the working memory and comprehension of the previous elements exposed

questions.title: How would you rate your overall satisfaction level with [company]?
It was easy for me to handle my issue today
Example: This was the best app my eyes had see
questions.extraText: Choices (Press ENTER for new line or paste a list)

questions.title: How do you feel about the experience offered by the [company]?
On a scale from 0-10, how likely are you to recommend [company] to a friend or colleague?
How can we improve the service?
